snippet: The stock market drifted lower as another plunge in oil prices yanked Chevron, Exxon Mobil and other energy companies down.
abstract: Stock market falls, partially due to drop in oil prices.
lead_paragraph: The stock market drifted lower as another plunge in oil prices yanked Chevron, Exxon Mobil and other energy companies down.

headline.main: Market Gives Ground as Oil Resumes Its Slide
headline.print_headline: Another Tumble in the Price of Oil Leaves Equities Mostly Lower
